docs.lead_paragraph: With protesters gathered outside, Representative Paul D. Ryan, the House Budget Committee chairman, on Monday defended his Medicare proposal in a speech to the Economic Club of Chicago.
docs.abstract: In a speech to the Economic Club of Chicago, Representative Paul D. Ryan pushes back against Democratic criticism of his idea to remake Medicare.
docs.snippet: In a speech to the Economic Club of Chicago, Representative Paul D. Ryan pushes back against Democratic criticism of his idea to remake Medicare.

docs.lead_paragraph: Sneaking into my mother’s garage to disable the engine of her 1997 Honda Accord was not something I ever imagined doing in my role as daughter and caregiver of a parent in failing health.

headline.main: My Solution to the Driving Problem: Vandalism

docs.abstract: I was prepared to help my mother with medical appointments, groceries, finances and more. But messing with her right to drive, I discovered, was a huge, neon-lit no-no.
docs.snippet: I was prepared to help my mother with medical appointments, groceries, finances and more. But messing with her right to drive, I discovered, was a huge, neon-lit no-no.

docs.lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich has acknowledged that his tendency to spout off like a political analyst might get him into trouble on the campaign trail.

headline.main: Gingrich Seeks to Clarify Comments on Individual Mandate

docs.abstract: On Monday, Newt Gingrich sought to explain away his comments in which he endorsed an individual mandate for health insurance.
docs.snippet: On Monday, Newt Gingrich sought to explain away his comments in which he endorsed an individual mandate for health insurance.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nasdaq and ICE Drop Offer for NYSE Euronext | The Nasdaq OMX Group and IntercontinentalExchange announced on Monday that they were withdrawing their bid for NYSE Euronext, after antitrust regulators said the deal would not gain the necessary approvals.
Many nursing homes do not provide health insurance for their employees and are lobbying for an exemption to the new health care law, which would require them to do so, The Times reports this morning.

headline.main: Nursing Homes Seek Exemption From Employee Insurance Requirement

docs.abstract: Many nursing home employees do not have health insurance — and will not, if nursing homes gain an exemption from the new health care law.
docs.snippet: Many nursing home employees do not have health insurance — and will not, if nursing homes gain an exemption from the new health care law.

docs.abstract: The latest political news from today's Times, around the Web and happenings in Washington.
docs.snippet: The latest political news from today's Times, around the Web and happenings in Washington.

docs.lead_paragraph: Alarmed at the cost of providing health insurance to workers, many nursing homes are seeking an exemption from the new law, which is intended to ensure access to affordable coverage.

headline.seo: Nursing Homes Seeking Reprieve From Health Care Law
headline.main: Nursing Homes Seek Exemptions From Health Law
headline.sub: Medicare Rates Make Coverage Impossible, Lobbyists Say;
headline.print_headline: Nursing Homes Seek Exemptions From Health Law

docs.snippet: Alarmed at the cost of providing health insurance to workers, many nursing homes are seeking an exemption from the new law, which is intended to ensure access to affordable coverage.

docs.lead_paragraph: As the Texas Legislature winds up business, redistricting has not been made final, and the budget isn’t done.
